top_questions.text: Which query is used to modify and calculate data in DBMS?​ f) List any two examples of format specifier (Conversion Character) used in C Language.

Write a program in C language to input marks of five subjects and calculate the total and average marks. [4] OR Write a program in C language to display the multiplication table of any number input by the user. Write a program in C language to display the multiplication table of any number input by the user.

Write a program in QBASIC that asks for the radius of a circle and calculates its area and circumference. Use a user-defined function to calculate the area and a sub-procedure to calculate the circumference. [4]
